name: Truck Offroad Drive Simulation
description:
Driving on snow hills, mountains and steep paths is a real driving challenge in off-road cargo truck driver simulator. Get ready for the realistic and exciting driving off-road snow truck driving experience. Drive off-road cargo truck to explore hilly environment and test your mountain driving skills

Features:
- Game play very easy
- Nice 3D environment desert, snow, mountain
- Graphics are also real scenes
- Amazing music and sound effect
